mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectItemInfo */ A.USR_NO , A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , A.REL_STR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{usrid})

SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectStateCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{usrid}) AND A.ITM_TYP = 'USR' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectUseCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{usrid}) AND A.ITM_TYP = 'USR' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectStrInfo */ A.STR_NO , A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A.REL_CTR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'STR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{strid})
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Ara2Usr.updateAllCnntByCnntid */ ARA2_CNNT A SET A.CNNT_YN = 'N' , A.DCNT_DTTM = SYSDATE , A.CNNT_MSG = 'FAIL' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{strid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Usr.insertCnntAraKey */ ARA2_CNNT VALUES ( SEQ_CNNT.NEXTVAL, #{strid}, 'STR', #{arakey}, 'Y', SYSDATE, null, null )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Usr.selectCnntArakeyInfo */ A.CNNT_NO , A.CNNT_ID , A.CNNT_TYP , A.ARA_KEY , A.CNNT_YN , A.CNNT_DTTM FROM ARA2_CNNT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{strid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = 'STR' AND A.ARA_KEY = #{arakey} AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Ara2Usr.updateCnntByCnntid */ ARA2_CNNT A SET A.CNNT_YN = 'N' , A.DCNT_DTTM = SYSDATE , A.CNNT_MSG = 'SUCCESS' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{strid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = 'STR' AND A.ARA_KEY = #{arakey} AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'
